Package org.springframework.aop.framework

Package containing Spring's basic AOP infrastructure, compliant with the AOP Alliance interfaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DynamicMethodPointcut Interface to be implemented by objects that can cause conditional invocation of an Interceptor depending on the method, arguments and attributes passed.
IntroductionInterceptor Subinterface of MethodInterceptor that allows additional interfaces to be implemented by the interceptor, and available via a proxy using that interceptor.
MethodPointcut Interface to be implemented by objects that can cause conditional invocation of an Interceptor depending on the method, arguments and attributes passed.
ProxyConfig Interface to be implemented by classes that hold the configuration of a factory of AOP proxies.
ProxyInterceptor Interface to be implemented by interceptors that have a proxy target.
StaticMethodPointcut Interface to be implemented by objects that can cause conditional invocation of an Interceptor depending on the method, and attributes passed.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMethodPointcut Abstract convenience superclass for implementations of DynamicMethodPointcut or StaticMethodPointcut.
AlwaysInvoked MethodPointcut implementation wrapping an Interceptor that should always run.
AopContext Class containing static methods used to obtain information about the current AOP invocation.
AopProxy InvocationHandler implementation for the Spring AOP framework, based on either J2SE 1.3+ dynamic proxies or CGLIB proxies.
AopUtils Utility methods used by the AOP framework.
DefaultProxyConfig Superclass for AOP Proxy configuration objects.
DelegatingIntroductionInterceptor Convenient implementation of the IntroductionInterceptor interface.
InvokerInterceptor Implementation of Interceptor interface that invokes a local target object using reflection.
MethodInvocationImpl Spring implementation of AOP Alliance MethodInvocation interface
ProxyFactory Factory for AOP proxies for programmatic use, rather than via a bean factory.
ProxyFactoryBean FactoryBean implementation for use to source AOP proxies from a Spring BeanFactory.
RegexpMethodPointcut Perl5 regular expression pointcut bean.
 

Exception Summary
AopConfigException Exception that gets thrown on illegal AOP configuration arguments.
 

Package org.springframework.aop.framework Description

Package containing Spring's basic AOP infrastructure, compliant with the AOP Alliance interfaces.
